name: World of Appcraft
description:
Welcome to the World of AppCraft - a parodic "ap-pic" (epic) role playing game!

You play the role of an app in this "app eat app" world. Attack other apps, equip your app with weapons and learn extraordinary app skills!

Play up to 3 app classes!

Are you a boring utility, an awesome game or just an extremely buggy app?

Download and start playing the most "Ap-pic" and hilarious RPG ever!

***Features***
- 3 different appic classes!
- Progress through 12 different app levels!
- Fight over 150 different other apps!
- Try out 15 different appic weapons and armours!
- Try out a mini jackpot and earn gold!
